title: If doom bots and devil teemo skin are live they are not showing up after update.
body: Downloaded the recent patch, but no doombots or new skins. So are they not live yet? Or is it only saying it in the patch notes?

replies.body:
skins will be released during the patch

Doom Bots will be in the RGM

Doombots would be considered a featured game mode, so it wouldn't be live unless it was the weekend.  You can find the upcoming schedule for that [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/rotating-game-mode-queue-now-live-24)!  I also don't have any information on new content unless it's been released, so bookmark our [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page for any udpates on that.  Hope that helps clear things up!
